channel.description: Last 10 notes on ðŸ§ My manifesto

item.title: speaking
item.description: (bonus) for the brave, there is a secret tactic, unfairly helpful, but not without a great effort: that is, listening to a recording of your own voice ...

item.title: meditation
item.description: I have done a marathon, and also vipassana for 5 hours. guess which one was harder. things like meditation are important. you should learn to get a long with the voice in your head.

item.title: confident
item.description: Confidence: not because I wanna be egotistical. It just makes everything a lot easier. Imagine if nothing made you nervous - how much more performant could you be? Easier is the wrong word.

item.title: I Love My Self-Hosted Friends
item.description: They just canâ€™t help but comprehend systems on such a deep level. Their brains are just too large to comprehend ever using the abstractions provided to them they think at such a foundational level.

item.title: new ideas
item.description: first read PG how to have good ideas: admit that your ideas suck (I would estimate that 95%+ of people think their ideas are above average) debias as earlier as possible btw, everyone ...

item.title: ego
item.description: Run away from anything that threatens to boost your ego.

item.title: how to have good ideas
item.description: read first: PG First, admit that you suck at thinking of ideas Then, debias as early as possible.

item.title: how to escape heartbreak
item.description: read mimesis channel ego first principles: you got them in the first place, and it ended for a reason .

item.title: deeply-understood
item.description: I have conceded that it is possible to truly know another. I have conceded that we are destined to merely interact with that part at the intersection of who they expose, and which part you understand.
